job.title: Software Engineer, Front End
job.description: ltstronggtTHE ROLEltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAs a Frontend Engineer youll take part in the design and development of software for the current and next generation of Teslas Enterprise Resource Planning systems In this role youll be developing highly complex applications with a team goal of streamlining business operations and improving overall user experience The ideal candidate is a selfstarter with a strong desire to increase efficiencies and make an impact while contributing to a crossfunctional team Your ability to creatively collaborate and execute team goals will affect scalabiliy and directly contribute to the company mission of accelerating the worlds transition to sustainable energyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt Work with experienced engineers across many functional areas to deliver business value to internal and external stakeholdersltligtltligt Design and develop new modules on the home grown ERP application Warp which is used to plan procure and produce carsltligtltligt Know your app Seek to understand all aspects business and technical of the applications on which you work so that you can be most effectiveltligtltligt Contribute towards the timely completion of development tasks and small projects while applying company standardsltligtltligt Continually learn and apply relevant software development practices patterns tools and technologiesltligtltligt Increase efficiency reduce waste wherever and whenever possibleltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt 4 years in web application development including Implementing Application Programming Interfaces APIs Object Oriented Programming and Design OOPampampD Object Relational Mapping ORMltligtltligt Experience in frontend development using tools such as JavaScript Angular React etcltligtltligt Agile Developmentltligtltligt Education BSMS in Computer Science or equivalent degreeltligtltulgt
